pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diversity Metrics Calculations for Rasterized Data // Alpha and beta diversity for taxonomic (TD), functional (FD), and phylogenetic (PD) dimensions based on rasters. Spatial and temporal beta diversity can be partitioned into replacement and richness difference components. It also calculates standardized effect size for FD and PD alpha diversity and the average individual traits across multilayer rasters. The layers of the raster represent species, while the cells represent communities. Methods details can be found at Cardoso et al. 2022 https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=BAT and Heming et al. 2023 https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=SESraster.
